item.title: 英美资源集团将在分拆前再出售 6% 的 Amplats 股份
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）将再出售 6% 的铂金业务，此举旨在增加该南非公司的自由流通量，以迎接全面退出。【原文：Anglo American Plc is selling another 6% of its platinum business in a move aimed at increasing the South African unit’s free float ahead of a full exit.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯计划在实现经济多元化的同时削减开支
item.description: 在今年超额完成目标之后，沙特阿拉伯概述了 2025 年削减支出的计划，以努力推进万亿美元的经济转型计划。【原文：Saudi Arabia outlined plans to trim spending in 2025 after overshooting targets this year in an effort to progress a trillion-dollar economic transformation plan.】

item.title: Pierer 因 KTM 部门在奥地利申请破产而股价暴跌
item.description: Pierer Mobility AG 的股票暴跌，因为该公司称其 KTM AG 摩托车部门正在奥地利申请自行管理破产。【原文：Shares of Pierer Mobility AG tumbled after the company said its KTM AG motorbike unit was filing for a self-administered insolvency in Austria.】

item.title: 恒大创始人许家印被中国法院禁止挥霍
item.description: 在陷入困境的房地产开发商中国恒大集团及其创始人许家印未能履行付款义务后，中国法院对其实施了支出限制。【原文：A Chinese court has imposed spending restrictions on beleaguered property developer China Evergrande Group and its founder Hui Ka Yan after the company failed to comply with payment obligations.】

item.title: Uber 利用雇佣的 "Gig-Coder "扩展人工智能数据标签业务
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.该公司正在超越其共享出行的根基，进入一个炙手可热的新市场：帮助其他企业将部分人工智能开发外包给独立承包商。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc.’s gig-economy workforce now includes programmers. The company is expanding beyond its rideshare roots to enter a hot new market: helping other businesses outsource some of their artificial intelligence development to independent contractors.】

item.title: 南方暴风雨后美国新房销售跌至两年低点
item.description: 由于两场飓风袭击了美国南部地区，加上经济承受能力方面的挑战继续给购房者带来压力，10 月份美国新房销量下滑至近两年来的最低点。【原文：Sales of new homes in the US slumped in October to the lowest in almost two years, as two hurricanes hit the South and affordability challenges continued to weigh on buyers.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心升至一年多来最高点
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大选获胜后，美国消费者对经济和劳动力市场持乐观态度，11 月份美国消费者信心指数上升至一年多来的最高水平。【原文：US consumer confidence increased in November to the highest level in more than a year on optimism about the economy and labor market in the wake of Donald Trump’s election victory.】

item.title: 被可可涨势烧伤的巧克力商仍需重建套期保值合约
item.description:
全球巧克力制造商在观望巧克力豆价格下降到何种程度后再采取下一步行动，他们意识到自己可能已经错过了时机。【原文：

Global chocolate makers waiting to see just how far bean prices would fall before making their next moves are realizing they may have missed the boat.

】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收高额关税后，墨西哥暗示将采取报复行动
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆建议，墨西哥可能会对唐纳德-特朗普威胁征收的关税做出回应，并警告说其经济后果将不堪设想。【原文：President Claudia Sheinbaum suggested Mexico could respond to Donald Trump’s threatened tariffs with levies of its own, warning the economic consequences would be dire.】

item.title: 欧佩克+再次就推迟重启石油产出展开会谈
item.description: 与会代表说，欧佩克+主要成员国已开始讨论推迟原定于1月份重启的石油生产，推迟时间可能长达数月。【原文：Key OPEC+ nations have begun discussions to delay the oil production restart planned for January, potentially for several months, delegates said.】

item.title: 加利福尼亚州的纽森将自己定位为马斯克和特朗普的对手
item.description: 在埃隆-马斯克准备在华盛顿掌握更多权力的同时，他创造财富的那个州也在蓄势待发。【原文：As Elon Musk prepares to wield more power in Washington, the state where he built his fortune is girding for a fight.】

item.title: 欧盟迫使荷兰采取财政措施以平衡预算
item.description: 欧盟将对荷兰实施更严格的财政政策，迫使其更积极地限制支出，而此前这个一向在财政上严于律己的国家却无视欧盟执行机构的建议。【原文：The European Union will impose a stricter fiscal path on the Netherlands, forcing it to limit its spending more aggressively after the traditionally financially disciplined country ignored recommendations from the bloc’s executive arm.】

item.title: 第一回合，警告射击，ZZZZ：华尔街对特朗普关税言论的反应
item.description: 周一晚间，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对美国的三大贸易伙伴征收高额关税，以阻止毒品和移民流入美国，这让交易员们猛然意识到，特朗普的经济政策是在 "一夜暴富"。【原文：Traders got a stark reminder of President-elect Donald Trump’s fly-by-night approach to economic policy Monday night, when he blasted off threats to use steep tariffs against America‘s three biggest trading partners to stop the flow of drugs and migrants into the US.】

item.title: 前谷歌和 Stripe 高管为人工智能代理初创公司融资 5600 万美元
item.description:
该公司希望构建一个 操作系统，为新一批人工智能产品提供支持。【原文：

The company is looking to build an operating system to support a new crop of artificial intelligence products.

】

item.title: 美国房价增长放缓，市场转向有利于购房者
item.description: 由于购房者在住房市场上获得了更大的谈判能力，9月份美国房价涨势放缓。【原文：Home-price gains in the US slowed in September as buyers gained more negotiating power in the housing market.】

item.title: 花旗通过投资 Pylon 进一步进军抵押贷款市场
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份声明，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. has made a minority investment in mortgage infrastructure fintech Pylon, pushing further into the mortgage market, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: Couche-Tard 不放弃收购 7-Eleven 所有者的出价
item.description: 加拿大便利店和燃料零售商 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. 尽管提出了价值约 580 亿美元的新管理层收购方案，但仍致力于收购其日本竞争对手 Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Canadian convenience store and fuel retailer Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. remains committed to snapping up its Japanese rival Seven & i Holdings Co. despite a new management buyout proposal valued at about $58 billion.】

item.title: 西门子为收购 Altair 获得 105 亿美元过桥贷款
item.description: 西门子公司已获得 105 亿美元的过桥贷款，为其对软件制造商 Altair Engineering Inc.【原文：Siemens AG has secured a $10.5 billion bridge loan facility to fund its largest-ever acquisition for software maker Altair Engineering Inc.】

item.title: 据说安吉里尼制药公司将与 CVC 的 Recordati 公司讨论合并事宜
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，意大利制药商 Angelini Pharma SpA 正在与私募股权公司 CVC Capital Partners Plc 旗下的国内同行 Recordati SpA 就潜在的合并事宜进行谈判。【原文：Italian drugmaker Angelini Pharma SpA is in talks on a potential combination with domestic peer Recordati SpA, which is owned by private equity firm CVC Capital Partners Plc, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Equinor 称亚洲和欧盟将在严冬争夺天然气
item.description: 据 Equinor ASA 公司称，由于燃料供应紧张，严冬将迫使亚洲和欧洲消费者竞相购买相同的天然气。【原文：A harsh winter would push Asian and European consumers into competition for the same gas as supplies of the fuel are stretched, according to Equinor ASA.】

item.title: 比特币 "远非泡沫"，Pantera 的莫雷德说
item.description: 比特币最早的美国专业投资者之一表示，比特币破纪录的涨势可能才刚刚开始。【原文：Bitcoin’s record-breaking rally may only be getting started, according to one of the earliest US professional investors in the original cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 英国支出监督机构拒绝签批政府账目
item.description: 英国支出监督机构有史以来首次拒绝签署政府的年度账目，并指出有大量积压的议会需要接受财务审计。【原文：The UK spending watchdog has refused to sign off on the government’s annual accounts for the first time ever, pointing to a huge backlog of councils needing to get their finances audited.】

item.title: 非洲银行希望在 2028 年之前上市，推迟退出中央银行的时间
item.description: 非洲银行有限公司（African Bank Ltd.）十年前被南非央行拯救，由于尚未完成上市准备工作，该公司计划于 2025 年上市的时间推迟了三年。【原文：African Bank Ltd., rescued by South Africa’s central bank a decade ago, delayed its planned listing in 2025 by three years as it’s yet to complete preparations to take the company public.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称，通货紧缩无法解决负担能力危机
item.description: 加拿大央行的一位官员表示，决策者的目标是将通胀率保持在 2% 的目标附近，并反驳了官员们应进一步放缓物价涨幅或导致通货紧缩的观点。【原文：A Bank of Canada official said policymakers aim to keep inflation near their 2% target, and pushed back on the idea that officials should slow price gains further or cause deflation.】

item.title: 尼日利亚再次提高利率以抑制高通胀
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行今年连续第六次提高利率，加大力度抑制不断飙升的通货膨胀，并支撑受创的奈拉。【原文：The Central Bank of Nigeria raised interest rates for the sixth straight time this year, intensifying its quest to curb surging inflation and support the battered naira.】

item.title: 家乐福道歉以平息法国-巴西肉类争端
item.description: 家乐福公司（Carrefour SA）曾表示不会在法国销售南美肉类，现在已向巴西公开道歉，以解决与巴西政府和农民之间的危机。【原文：Carrefour SA has issued a public apology to Brazil to settle a crisis with its government and farmers, after having said the company would not sell South American meat in France.】

item.title: 芝加哥市长努力为负债累累的城市寻找税收解决方案
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）有五周时间通过预算，以填补该市近 10 亿美元的赤字。时间紧迫，资金也是如此。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson has five weeks to pass a budget that fills the city’s nearly $1 billion deficit. Time is short, and so is the money.】

item.title: 红杉支持的 Eon 在成立 11 个月后市值达 14 亿美元
item.description: 云备份初创公司 Eon Inc. 在成立不到一年的时间里完成了新一轮融资，公司估值达 14 亿美元。【原文：Cloud backup startup Eon Inc. has closed a new funding round that values the company at $1.4 billion less than a year after its founding — an unusually speedy trajectory to unicorn status.】

item.title: 安哥拉称不会就国际货币基金组织可能的新贷款计划进行谈判
item.description: 安哥拉说，目前没有与国际货币基金组织就可能的新财政援助计划进行谈判。【原文：Angola said there are currently no negotiations taking place with the International Monetary Fund about a possible new financial-assistance program.】

item.title: 西班牙期待大型私募股权交易启动 IPO 市场
item.description: 银行家们寄希望于几家大型私募股权公司的上市，以重振明年西班牙的首次公开募股市场，而最近几个月有几家候选公司推迟了上市计划，原因是市场形势严峻。【原文：Bankers are pinning their hopes on a few large private equity-backed listings to rekindle Spain’s IPO market next year, after several candidates postponed plans to go public in recent months blaming tough market conditions.】
